questions.question: Where are the markets
questions.answer: B1, E3, C1, D6 (More to come)

questions.question: ccc
questions.answer:
In game do the following steps:
1: Hit the Tilde/Tick key ` (The key to the left of the number 1 and below esc) to open the console
2: Type ccc and hit enter.
3: Then tab out to discord and paste (ctrl + v) into support.
